skins.selfIntroduction: I'm ?mile Bertin of Iris Libre~ In days of old, I worked hard laying mines... and leading destroyers. I also transported gold, took part in Operation Dragoon, and participated in a few other missions, so you could say I got through the war unscathed... I suppose?
skins.acquisition: Bonjour~ I'm ?mile Bertin of Iris Libre. You can just call me ?mile~ I want to make friends with everyone here~
skins.login: Bonjour~ Commander, before we get to work, I say we do some stretches~
skins.details: I love dancing because it brings joy to people?
skins.secretaryIdle1: The Land of Gold ¨C the Sakura Empire! Fantastique! I do hope to see it one day!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Compared to those 2 years at Fort-de-France... it's wonderful to be able to dance freely beneath the blue sky~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, is there anything I can help you with? Whatever it is, I'd love to.
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you worn out, Commander? Shall I perform my energizing dance for you?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, if you're asking me for a dance, you need to do it more courteously~!

skins.shipDescription: ?mile Bertin, retrofit complete! I feel like a completely new person! To show my gratitude, Commander, I'll perform a brand new dance for you!
skins.acquisition: ?mile Bertin, retrofit complete! I feel like a completely new person! To show my gratitude, Commander, I'll perform a brand new dance for you!
skins.login: It's a wonderful day today as well, Commander!
skins.details: As I am now, I'll surely be able to dance for you even more wonderfully!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, did you know that the most important thing in dance is not the technique, but rather the confidence? Yes, the confidence that "I am at my very best on stage!"
skins.secretaryIdle2: The dances of the Sakura Empire, in contrast to my passionate and free-flowing form, focus more on tradition. C'est magnifique!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Recently, more and more people have become interested in dance. Commander, you should join as well!
skins.secretaryTouch: The essence of dancing is to follow your own feelings. Come on, Commander! Allons danser!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, you need to focus more when you're dancing!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, does my swimsuit pique your fancy? I'm actually quite proud of my fashion sense. *Giggle* Now, let's enjoy midsummer together~
skins.acquisition: Commander, does my swimsuit pique your fancy? I'm actually quite proud of my fashion sense. *Giggle* Now, let's enjoy midsummer together~
skins.login: Commander, don't forget to stretch before going into the ocean, okay?
skins.details: Commander, how about a game of beach volleyball? I actually happen to be quite good at it?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, could I ask you to apply sunscreen to my skin next time we go to the beach?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Long hair is quite inconvenient when you're swimming... Which way of tying up my hair is your favorite, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, Commander~ Since we're going to the beach, why not change into your swim gear ahead of time? Oh, no, I definitely don't want to see how it looks on you, not at all~
skins.secretaryTouch: Go on ahead without you? Why, a secretary can't just casually part from her Commander, can she? I'll be right here waiting for you?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: It seems as summer comes forth, so too does your passion~

skins.shipDescription: I heard of this romantic concept of maid outfits, and thought I'd try one on to see how it feels~ What are your thoughts, Commander?
skins.acquisition: I heard of this romantic concept of maid outfits, and thought I'd try one on to see how it feels~ What are your thoughts, Commander?
skins.login: "Welcome back, Master~" ¨C Just like how all the Royal Maids do it~
skins.details: Be they simple dresses or extravagant costumes, any outfit can be romantic once you actually put it on!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Wouldn't it be lovely if these stuffed toys could join me for a dance~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I've heard people describe their dreams as astonishing or romantic. I wonder, have you had any fascinating dreams like that, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm more fond of imparting my passion to others through actions than through words while sitting down~
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe~ I will perform a little number called "The Maid's Dance" for you~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: This sort of lust is not what romance is about!
